config.env_names_all: local remote alp-dev-sg-2 alp-dev-sg-3 alp-stg-de-1 alp-stg-sg-1 alp-stg-sg-2

scripts.create:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do yarn create:env $ENV_NAME; done
scripts.flatten:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn flatten:env; done
scripts.get:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_base[@]} ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:env; done
scripts.get:env:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:env; done
scripts.get:env:local: for ENV_NAME in base-all base-local local; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:env; done
scripts.get:env:remote: for ENV_NAME in base-all base-remote $ENV_NAME; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn get:env; done
scripts.load:all: yarn load:permissions && yarn load:synpuf1k && yarn load:vocab
scripts.pivot:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn pivot:env; done
scripts.put:env:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn put:env; done
scripts.put:env:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn put:env; done
scripts.set:env: ENV_TYPE=$ENV_TYPE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME scripts/set-env.sh && ENV_TYPE=$ENV_TYPE TLS_REGENERATE=$TLS_REGENERATE yarn --cwd .. gen:tls && D2E_RESOURCE_LIMIT=$D2E_RESOURCE_LIMIT ENV_TYPE=$ENV_TYPE yarn --cwd .. gen:resource-limits
